News.headline: 50/50 Draw Braintree Town
News.short_description: The winner for the Daggers' Vanarama National League game versus Braintree Town is ticket number 04915
News.description:
The winning ticket worth £122.00 was drawn at half time. The winning ticket was claimed by Sean McMahon.

Second place winner for the £50 Johnstone's Paint voucher is ticket number 04974, which was claimed by Stewart McIntyre.

The third place winner for the copy of Football Manager 2017 (PC) is ticket number 04842, which was claimed by Richard King.

50/50 tickets can be purchased on match days for £1.

Don't forget the Daggers are now in partnership with Johnstone's Paints who are now offering Daggers fans 25% off in their stores click here for full details.
